item.title: #TIL : Can not get real IP address from Load Balancer SSL Passthrough
item.description: Can not get real IP address from Load Balancer SSL Passthrough When you use a load balancer stay in front of your app, and use SSL Passthrough mode.

item.title: [PHP 0 to 1] : Cơ bản về Web
item.description: Mục tiêu : Nhằm hiểu ở mức nền tảng, cơ bản Web là gì và hoạt động ra sao

item.title: SESWatcher : how to prevent Amazon SES account from being suspended
item.description: Introdution At this moment, AWS SES service is the best affordable price and high-quality service to sending (and receiving) programmatic emails.

item.title: #TIL : Sending Cookie in AJAX CORs request
item.description: Sending Cookie in AJAX CORs request By default, browser will remove the cookie and authorization header from AJAX CORs request.

item.title: #TIL : Bypass CORS by using JSONP callback
item.description: Bypass CORS by using JSONP callback Sometimes you are blocked from request a cross-origin resource. Instead of adding our domain to allowed list of them, we can use another way to retrieve data from their API by using JSONP (in case they support it).

item.title: #TIL : HSTS rule in browser
item.description: HSTS rule in browser HTTP Strict Transport Security (HSTS) is a web security policy mechanism which helps to protect websites against protocol downgrade attacks and cookie hijacking.

item.title: #TIL : Using web proxy to bypass firewalls
item.description: Using web proxy to bypass firewalls Someday, you will be blocked by a firewall while trying crawling or accessing some website.

item.title: #TIL : Ping Google to crawl updated content
item.description: Ping Google to crawl updated content When you post new content to your website, the fastest way is ping search engines to notify them.

item.title: #TIL : Cloudflare Error 522 Connection Time out
item.description: Cloudflare Error 522 Connection Time out If you are using Cloudflare as a proxied web server, it will provide many benefits about performance (assets caching, prevent DDOS and cheap CDN).

item.title: Sử dụng Frontend Boilerplate cho việc cắt HTML Layout
item.description: Giới thiệu Khi cắt HTML Layout từ PSD, bạn sẽ đối mặt với việc bên Design hoặc khách hàng thường xuyên yêu cầu thay đổi giao diện, thiết kế.
